title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: Undeterred by a police ban, hundreds of thousands of protesters marched across Hong Kong on Sunday in opposition to the government's anti-mask law.Pro-democracy demonstrators blocked roads, set fires and vandalized Chinese banks and subway exits, expressing strong anti-Chinese sentiment.And again familiar scenes of unrest were seen, as riot police fired water cannons and tear gas at demonstrators.Hong Kong government implemented the anti-mask law two weeks ago.Recent so-called "white terror" attacks have further escalated tensions in Hong Kong.Last week, the leader of a Hong Kong pro-democracy group was smashed in the head with hammers and spanners by at least four non-ethnic Chinese assailants in Mong Kok.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
